org.minifx.fxcommons

Class MiniFxSceneBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.minifx.fxcommons.MiniFxSceneBuilder

  • public final class MiniFxSceneBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple builder for a javaFx Scene. It includes by default the CSS style of the MiniFx framework.
